Rounds.Name: Pre-Flop
Rounds.Description: Players receive two hole cards each.

Rounds.Name: Flop
Rounds.Description: Three community cards are dealt face-up.

Rounds.Name: Turn
Rounds.Description: A fourth community card is dealt face-up.

Rounds.Name: River
Rounds.Description: A fifth and final community card is dealt face-up.

Rounds.Name: Showdown
Rounds.Description: Players reveal their hole cards, and the best hand wins.

Blinds.SmallBlind: Mandatory bet by player to dealer's left.
Blinds.BigBlind: Mandatory bet by the next player to the left.

HandRankings.Name: Royal Flush
HandRankings.Description: A, K, Q, J, 10 of the same suit.

HandRankings.Name: Straight Flush
HandRankings.Description: Five cards in sequence of the same suit.

HandRankings.Name: Four of a Kind
HandRankings.Description: Four cards of the same rank.

HandRankings.Name: Full House
HandRankings.Description: Three of a kind and a pair.

HandRankings.Name: Flush
HandRankings.Description: Five cards of the same suit.

HandRankings.Name: Straight
HandRankings.Description: Five cards in sequence of any suit.

HandRankings.Name: Three of a Kind
HandRankings.Description: Three cards of the same rank.

HandRankings.Name: One Pair
HandRankings.Description: Two cards of the same rank.

HandRankings.Name: High Card
HandRankings.Description: The highest card when no other hand is made.

Dealer.Selection: Determined by a random draw initially, then rotates clockwise.

Rules.TieBreaker: The pot is split among players with the same best hand.

SpecialSituations.AllIn: If a player goes all-in, a side pot is created for additional bets by other players.
SpecialSituations.Misdeal: If the dealer makes a mistake in dealing, the hand is voided and re-dealt.
